name: Battle Sense
desc:
You become able to see up to twelve seconds into the future, granting a nearly impossible benefit against weapon users. For the duration of the spell, weapon attacks can only hit you on a roll of 20.

At the start of each of your turns, you must use either 1 AP and half of your movement, or 2 AP, to continue concentrating on this spell. If you choose not to pay either cost, the spell ends.
